Uses of Class
net.myorb.math.polynomial.PolynomialFamilyManager.PowerFunctionList

  • Packages that use PolynomialFamilyManager.PowerFunctionList 
    Package Description
    net.myorb.math.computational
    Support for computation in multiple dimensions mostly focused on calculus.
    net.myorb.math.polynomial
    Implementations of algorithms supporting polynomial concepts (family, calculus, fields).
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families
    Implementations of algorithms supporting polynomial families (Hermits, Jacobi, Legendre, others).
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families.bessel
    Implementations of algorithms supporting Bessel polynomial family specifically.
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families.chebyshev
    Implementations of algorithms supporting Chebyshev polynomial family specifically.
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families.gegenbauer
    Implementations of algorithms supporting Gegenbauer polynomial family specifically.
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families.jacobi
    Implementations of algorithms supporting Jacobi polynomial family specifically.
    net.myorb.math.polynomial.families.legendre
    Implementations of algorithms supporting Legendre polynomial family specifically.
